short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Break your shopping basket down in to how long you'd have to work to afford it - should you really buy it?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cut down on impulse buying! This chrome extension will let you know how long you'd have to work to afford the value of your online shopping basket, so you can know if going through with the purchase is really worth it. 
Currently works on the following websites:
* Amazon
* Ebay
* New Look
* Asos
* Etsy
More to follow!
